text: Arthur Robbins (4 February 1920 – 8 November 2010) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1920 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Arthur Robbins
